body_content.explanation: the act of sending out gas, heat, light, etc. for a second, third, etc. time, or an amount of gas, heat, light, etc. that is sent out for a second, third, etc. time:
examples: The blinds are positioned away from the occupants to reduce re-emission of heat and allow diffuse daylight to enter the building.
A resonant photon can escape only after several absorptions and reemissions if the plasma has a finite optical thickness for it.
